Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Yes. Using smart contracts to drive token movement automates the process, and removes the need to trust a single party with the funds. Blockchain and smart contracts together will manage and implement features on our platform involving:  • Identity of user (tenant / landlord); • Know Your Customer / Anti-Money Laundering; • Reputation; • All activity that modifies the smart contract based identity profile; • All agreements by parties; and • All activity that drives token movement;  Each party will have their own identity private key / wallet, stored in their mobile device and secured using biometrics, and any user activity that is driven through the smart contract will be initiated / approved using the identity wallet as immutable proof of consent.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello angelinakorenovskaya, Here are 6 important things that you should take into account while relying on this method:  * Authentication of the signature. On Rentberry, we utilize HelloSign electronic signature service. Everyone who uses it is authenticated and should provide either the login data or receive a special request for a signature via the e-mail. All the personal data including passwords and usernames are properly encrypted with the help of 256-bit SSL method. Accidental information leakages are prevented by session timeouts that are done automatically. Moreover, you always receive notifications on your e-mail when some actions are taken in your account. * Signature affixation. Every signature is affixed to the contract. Each contact is also affixed with the audit trail that helps identify who and when signed the contract. * The authenticity of the contract. An authentic copy of every document is created before it is signed by the parties. * Reliable transaction history. Comprehensive transaction history is available for an easy reach at any time you need it. * Universal solution for any platform. You can access your rental agreement from anywhere if you have a stable Internet connection and are using a major web browser. * Easy download. Your document can be easily downloaded in a convenient PDF format.

Author: thelastofas
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello graxoff,  Thanks for the question. The payments are accepted in fiat now. we use ACH payments, one of the most widespread and trustworthy systems of electronic payments in the US. You can read more about collecting rent by this link: https://rentberry.com/blog/how-to-collect-rent  It will be possible to accept it with BERRY quite soon. BERRY can be sent by a landlord on exchanges or used for property promotion or  utility services which will be available on the website.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Let us list a few of the main benefits:  1. Agents will get leads together with their score and background check right away, which allows to shorten the time on checks and negotiations.  2. The benefits will include the ability to list any property on the platform with a specified asking price and include detailed information on the given rental unit. Using BERRY tokens, landlords can promote listings on rentberry.com or syndicate to additional rental sites for increased reach and visibility.  3. Rental price auction will allow the following: Reduce vacancy rates by seamlessly addressing pricing in depressed market conditions; capitalize on hot markets by extracting the most value from their properties; select tenants based on data points beyond the amount they are willing to pay.  4. All payments on the platform will be executed in BERRY tokens. Agents will be able to collect rent in BERRY tokens seamlessly and securely and use it for utility services on the platform.

Author: PacifistUA
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: In less than two years, Rentberry has grown into a nationwide platform and now it covers 4,948 cities across the US. Rentberry have more than 224K property listings and nearly 120K users. Rentberry perform the identity checks for both Tenants and Landlords to avoid scam. All the private data entered is secured and strictly confidential. The data submitted by Tenants is checked by Experian. The data submitted by Landlords is checked by our secure partner. This way Rentberry makes sure the Landlords get the applications from verified Tenants only, as well as the Tenants are sure the property is added by real verified Landlords.

The company has also developed unique auctioning technology for pricing, a proprietary scoring algorithm to help screening processes and a crowd-sourced security deposit fund for saving money

Author: Katy Brown
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry is not website which only classifies ads like most of its competitors like Craigslist, Zillow, Rightmove etc. It's a close-loop rental platform which fulfills all the rental tasks in one place: • Searching for properties;• Making offers / bids via the Rentberry auctioning platform;• Screening prospects;• Selecting the best / most suitable candidates;• Negotiating the terms;• Unlocking rental security deposits;• E-signing contracts;• Paying rent;• Submitting maintenance requests;• Hiring third-party service providers (e.g., handymen and plumbers); and• Enabling landlords to stay connected with tenants.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

It will be advanced, decentralized, secure/immutable and intuitive than vertically-focused solutions that analyze only one aspect of a renter’s history (such as Experian credit reports in the U.S.). In addition, since the Rentberry scores are part of the tenant and landlord profiles on the Rentberry platform, they can be used internationally. This will open a number of new possibilities

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello, You are right, the token sale is over. If you would like to purchase BERRY tokens right now, you may purchase them on hotBTC or IDEX. In regards to your second question, we are not in the business of short-term rentals. It is an absolutely different market. Rentberry is the platform developed for the long-term rental, it combines all the current rental tasks like e-signing, tenant screening, rent payments, utility requests, etc.

All payments on the platform will be executed in BERRY tokens. Landlords will be able to collect rent in BERRY tokens seamlessly and securely and use it for other services on the platform, such as plumbers, electricians, etc.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry will use blockchain technology to streamline the entire long-term rental process by making it possible for tenants and landlords to complete all rental tasks in one place. These tasks include:   • Searching for properties; • Making offers / bids via the Rentberry auctioning platform; • Screening prospects; • Selecting the best / most suitable candidates; • Negotiating the terms; • Unlocking rental deposits; • E-signing contracts; • Paying rent; • Submitting maintenance requests; • Hiring third-party service providers (e.g., handymen and plumbers); and • Enabling landlords to stay connected with tenants.   You may find the details in the Whitepaper by this link: https://cdn.rentberry.com/ico/downloads/Rentberry_Whitepaper_en.pdf

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello, Thanks for your question. We do not have competitors at the moment as most of the real estate websites still include listings in the form of simple classified ads in print publications like Craigslist, Zillow, Rightmove and Zoopla which provide limited information about a particular property for prospective tenants and essentially no support for actionable items, such as the application process, contract execution, rent collection, and maintenance requests. Today, Rentberry offers users a fully operational, web-based long-term rental platform.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry plans to allow tenants to make their rental payments in BERRY tokens starting in 2018. This means no more fees will be incurred that will be associated with a credit card or wire transfer payment, bounced checks, unrecorded cash transactions, or long wait times for receiving payments. The risk of any fraudulent activity will be minimized as all payments will be recorded on an immutable ledger.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Once we implement the tasks mentioned in our Roadmap, it will be possible to complete the following tasks on the platform:  • Searching for properties; • Making offers / bids via the Rentberry auctioning platform; • Screening prospects; • Selecting the best / most suitable candidates; • Negotiating the terms; • Unlocking rental deposits; • E-signing contracts; • Paying rent; • Submitting maintenance requests; • Hiring third-party service providers (e.g., handymen and plumbers); and • Enabling landlords to stay connected with tenants.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi there. Is it basically Zillow type platform just with some additional features like including data on potential renters then payments are in Berry tokens?

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello,  We are the first closed-loop rental platform. Platforms like Zillow is just the website including simple classified ads.  Here are some key benefits for landlords:  - Landlord benefits will include the ability to list any property on the platform with a specified asking price and include detailed information on the given rental unit. - All rental applications will be collected in a user-friendly format with the option to accept or reject any application with a single click. - Quick information exchange:  e-signing rental agreement, online open house scheduling, instant messages between landlords and tenants - As Rentberry evolves, the platform will allow tenants and landlords to rate each other by submitting reviews, and will also allow both parties to assess each other by reference to those reviews and an immutable record of rental activity stored on the blockchain. - All payments on the platform will be executed in BERRY tokens. Landlords will be able to collect rent in BERRY tokens seamlessly and securely and use it for other services on the platform (property promotion, utility services, participation in crowdsourced security deposits).

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

Body: Dear team, Is there any detailed guide on how to purchase tokens on exchanges? I would like to purchase some in order to use them for future on the platform.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Sure, please follow this detailed guide on how to buy BERRY on HitBTC:   1. Register for a HitBTC account by following the button “Register” in the top navigation menu. (https://hitbtc.com) 2. After successfully completing the registration and sign-in process, click the green “Deposit” button in the top navigation menu: http://prntscr.com/jwal6a  3. You will be taken to the page, where all the different options for deposit are available. A dropdown section will display with your deposit address listed in both text and QR code form: http://prntscr.com/jwaohb  4. Transfer the chosen amount to the address displayed.  5. As your account is credited with the amount transferred to HitBTC, it will be placed inside your Main account. Transfer the deposited Ethereum or Bitcoin to your trading account by pressing the right arrow next to your currency amount and confirm the amount you wish to transfer to your trading account: http://prntscr.com/jwaq7p  6. Once the deposit is in your account, visit BERRY/ETH or BERRY/BTC trading pair, depending on which you have deposited in your account. Scroll down to the “Buy BERRY” panel. Select the “Market” tab to buy BERRY at the current market price: http://prntscr.com/jwaron  7. Enter the amount of BERRY you wish to buy in the “Amount” field and then confirm your selection by clicking the “Buy Market” button.  8. You will also be able to see your BERRY balance in your Account page by clicking Account in navigation bar below the main navigation section.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello Lion_ashy8, Of course, we took it into account, that's why Rentberry will have an individual scoring system. On the Rentberry platform, all information on tenants and landlords will be recorded on smart contracts and used by a smart oracle to calculate the proprietary tenant and landlord scores. Where an individual is located will not be an issue as information and scores for both parties will be saved to the platform and made available upon request and when granted permission.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi Tangri,  Sure, credit score report generation is already available on the platform. Once tenant applies, the report is instantly generated and is sent to landlord together with the application. What we're going to implement in future is our own scoring system, which will be based on data from many sources: information from applications, previous payment performance, history of evictions, data and scores from credit bureaus, past due accounts etc.

Author: Tangri
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Looks like this forum is infested with fud/trolls.  Perhaps they are expecting quick return on investment but ICO sometime takes long time to fruit.  My other holding QRL hasnt even released mainnet even after 2 years of development since their ICO.  Be patient.  My original investment on Berry didn't bear as it asked too many questions like KYC etc.  I got my Ether back and after long patient months, I started buying in at around 3 cents each.  Will keep buying as price drops more until I have half million berries or more.  Its great bargain price atm.  Perhaps original revolutionary concept is lost to many people.  I still believe in innovation and what this team is trying to achieve.  Its noble goal and I am very excited to be part of it.  This endeavor may take a year or longer but I will keep my berries until it bear fruits.  I have been reading some of twitter posting about rental rules etc, and pleasantly surprised how knowledgeable the Mr Lubinsky and team are.  Also taking legal action against Seattle convinced me that team is up to date on rental regulations, keeping keen eyes.  I don't blame the team for not responding if needless, pointless questions are raised.  We are all busy people and do not deserve to be frustrated.  Let team do its work and be patient.  Seeing the crypto market has turned negative at the moment, unsurprisingly, I do hope team has converted the ether/btc ico funds into fiat currency already, or at least some of it.  Bear will grip the market for time to come as market sorts itself out.  Another concern would be future marketing plan.  Legal contracts  such as rental agreements are complicated thing and frequent involvement of courts with evictions and such, might dissuade many potential landlords from joining the program.  It would be nice to have a glimpse of how team is going to overcome initial objections.   I am confident about professionality of team and especially media savvy Mr Lubinsky.  I hope he keeps up his good work know that there are us who supports the team.   Thanks.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello True_Will_Set_You_Free  Please, find our comments to your questions below: - We cannot require or demand the employees to open their LinkedIn profiles to the public as this is fully private space. If you want to see the team, please visit our Team page or join to the next Q&A session.  - We understand your concerns. Please, be informed that we can not and will never manipulate the token price. We never promised any lambos or moons. Please also note as well that we are Utility token and you can use it already on our platform. Our team is concentrated on product development and expansion. As the largest token holders of BERRY token, we do all we can to make Rentberry a successful company.  - We have excluded the Rentberry Club concept from Rentberry way before the start of our Token Sale (December, 5th) and therefore we do not have it in our Whitepaper and Road Map.

Author: Bezuprechnyj
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Wow, I didn't expect that here will be such a heated debate.) Maybe you started to sound the alarm early? I understand that the price of the token is far from the desired, but the project team is not silent, Lubinsky appears at the question and answer session, then participates in the podcast. The project is suing the Seattle leadership in the end. It doesn't look like a scam at all. I recently invested in a scam: a seemingly promising project that conducted an active aggressive marketing campaign, after the ICO introduced a commission for the withdrawal of tokens, the project profiles in social networks are silent for 2 weeks. Discussion of the situation takes on the forum for more than a dozen pages, and no answer is received. That's really a scam. About Rentberry I have no such suspicions.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Dear cacaonuts,   Feel free to visit and register rentberry platform by this link: https://rentberry.com/ You may sign up, and search for the property in the USA, reach landlords through the platform by sending them messages (we are represented in more than 5,000 cities over the country.  Currently, the following functionality is available:  • Searching for properties; • Making offers / bids via the Rentberry auctioning platform; • Screening prospects; • Selecting the best / most suitable candidates; • Negotiating the terms; • E-signing contracts; • Paying rent; • Instant messager. • Payment in BERRY tokens  And of course, we are working further on platform development: further tokenization, applications, international expansion. Feel free to track the latest news in our Telegram News Channel: https://t.me/RentberryNews  There is also a possibility to ask questions to Rentberry CEO directly during Q&A sessions (they are held monthly).

Author: xiaocai2015
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I want to know how the blockchain can solve the real estate problem. After all, there are too many problems involved in real estate,How can we collectively solve the biggest problem of the 21st century

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello xiaocai2015,  Rentberry will use blockchain technology to streamline the entire long-term rental process by making it possible for tenants and landlords to complete all rental tasks in one place. These tasks include: searching for properties, tenant screening, making offers, unlocking rental deposits, submitting maintenance request, paying rent, hiring third-party service providers (e.g., handymen and plumbers), enabling landlords to stay connected with tenants etc.  In the future, we plan to decentralize and fully automate the tasks listed above using blockchain technology powered by our BERRY token.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry and RoomDao Join Forces In Strategic Partnership  We are excited to announce Rentberry is partnering with RoomDao to support our efforts in bringing effective blockchain powered solutions to customers worldwide.  RoomDao is a virtual marketplace that strives to improve both quality and variety of tourist services from car rental to accommodation. Rentberry is employing the same vision in the long-term rental industry, providing a transparent platform for home rental services and price negotiations, directly connecting landlords with tenants.  We are seeking to share our knowledge and expertise to further global transparent digital market. RoomDao adopts pioneering features of Rentberry, integrates its data and algorithms.  Additionally, it is planned that customers will be able to use BERRY tokens and RoomDao tokens to pay on both platforms.  Our support of RoomDao is another example of our commitment to innovative solutions that revolutionize traditional service industries with blockchain. Check the details by the link: https://rentberry.com/blog/partnership-with-roomdao?utm_source=telegram&utm_medium=cpc

Author: stonesourcery
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry is disrupting the long term rental space with an entire one stop ecosystem for landlords and tenants and as such is a first mover to the market  I would think that when evaluating an investment in the blockchain space-the same questions that we asked when evaluating the project at ICO stage…are relevant now to checking the health of our investments   so let’s revisit  those questions  answer these for yourself and then consider the general market where it’s been (hyper growth in 2017 ==> inevitable market correction January  2018) and compare the price action with Bitcoin & Altcoin market in general. (buy the Dips)   1 How unique is the idea? Does it answer a real world need or create an efficiency that is lacking in the way that it is currently served ?  What are the economics?  The business model has to make sense and have a purpose. Is this an actual business idea that can scale? 2  Financial fundamentals of the project :The smart contract that manages the coin’s distribution has specific rules, like how much will be made available, to whom, when, and whether unsold coins will be “burned” or not-i.e “scarcity" 3 Listing on Exchange(s) (admittedly unkown at ICO however how’s the roadmap Post-ICO? 4 Which blockchain is it built on? Is it scalable? supported? 5 Who is on the team? LinkedIn / Google search what are the team members track records in this and related industries ? Have they done it before? Do they have a proof of work? Is their skill-set strong enough to perform well? Is there a pain point that really needs addressing? 6 evaluate the white paper ,is it comprehensive, thorough, and explain the technology and purpose? 7  Roadmap & timely execution of goals 8. community  can be a crucial indicator of a cryptocurrency’s potential  other resources  How To Find Your Next Cryptocurrency Investment.)  Christopher Grey, co-founder at CapLinked Before venturing into ICO's, it's important to have a sound understanding of the blockchain, how cryptocurrencies function and the right steps to take when entering the crypto market. Investopedia Academy's Cryptocurrency for Beginners course https://medium.com/apex-token-fund/dr-james-canton-ph-d-interview-the-future-of-blockchain-and-cryptocurrency-investing-18776722d816

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry strikes a powerful alliance with Cushman & Wakefield Texas Multifamily Advisory Team  Rentberry, a long-term home rental platform powered on blockchain is partnering with Edward Nwokedi, Executive Director of Cushman & Wakefield of Texas Multifamily Division – part of Cushman & Wakefield Capital Markets Division – one of the largest global real estate firms operating in more than 70 countries. The two teams plan to join forces to showcase how apartment owners can improve leasing performance and property values by implementing Rentberry’s efficient and seamless technology.  Ed’s division of Cushman and Wakefield covers Texas which has an enormous amount of new construction of Multifamily units and in need of a solution for the fast and efficient leasing.  Rentberry is an all-encompassing long-term rental platform that manages every step of the rental process, from property searching and open-house scheduling to e-signing documents and paying rent. Rentberry empowers its users by increasing the transparency and allows them to save valuable time and money by having all rental tasks done in one place.  “Our team is very excited and looking forward to working together with Ed at Cushman & Wakefield Texas office – Texas is one of the largest real estate markets for Multifamily in the US. We feel there is a very strong synergy where our technology and value proposition can help Cushman’s Multifamily clients achieve their goals. We are also the only company on the market that is developing blockchain technology in the long-term rental space with the ambition to help tenants save millions in rental deposits“– said Alex Lubinsky, CEO, Rentberry.  “Rentberry has a very strong value proposition when it comes to minimizing vacancy. Its novel custom offer submission technology allows for precise pricing of the properties thus potentially saving lots of valuable time and money to our clients. For example, one of our clients, has 80,000 units and is very interested in the real estate blockchain technology that Rentberry offers. Rentberry is unique company as its in front of the pack when it comes to disrupting rental market and integrating blockchain technology and we feel there is strong potential working together.” says Edward Nwokedi, the Executive Director of the Cushman & Wakefield’s Multifamily Advisory group.  Rentberry is also finalizing partnerships with top real estate companies in other countries thus making its technology a truly global value proposition.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Dear Rentberry Community!  We’ve got great things to work on since the end of our token sale. Let us share our plans for the nearest future with you.  1. We currently work on our international expansion and believe that soon you will be able to rent a place via https://rentberry.com  anywhere around the globe!  2. Apps for Android and iOS are going to be ready by the end of summer.  3. We have already started the platform tokenization and are going to implement more options available for BERRY soon.  4. Our team is expanding - both marketing and developers team. We are hiring more people and going to be a team of 50 by the end of the year.  5. We had a Q&A session via Facebook Live Stream last week where any token holder could ask our CEO a question, it was a great one hour talk.  6. Our product works 3 years on the market already and we continue to support it, bring new features and firmly follow our roadmap, so stay tuned for more updates.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Based on availability and owners’ expectations, the rental market in Dubai has fluctuated massively over the last 20 years.  Rentberry has the proven technology that is created to ensure that landlords price their properties optimally in both hot and slow markets, while potential tenants are afforded complete visibility on competing offers and offered the ability to seamlessly negotiate rental terms online.

It’s going to really annoy a lot of people when they come to withdraw tokens. You should have stated this more clearly. I imagine most people will have done what I did and transfer the amount of ETH they want to spend on BERRY and no more. Now we will all have to make another transfer of ETH into CryptoNomos just to get our BERRY out. I.e. we have to pay to get what we have already bought. Author: SixFigures
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: The thing is people should ask themselves which problems they really have in those contractual relationships and what a solution could look like. As a next step you could ask whether you think that a smart contract might be able to model a solution for the problem in the form of executable code. If not then there needs to be an added solution layer for that to still make the system superior to what we have today.

Author: Petersha
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Final statistics on token sale is released on website https://ico.rentberry.com/  More than 17 thousand contributors from 136 countries participated in BERRY token sale.  More than 22 thousand transactions were made with an average contribution of $1,695 / contributor.  BERRY tokens will be distributed by March, 30.  You will be able to send your BERRY tokens from Cryptonomos  to any ERC-20 compatible wallet such as My Ethereum Wallet. Please, be informed that the gas fee would be required to transfer tokens to your external wallet. The minimum deposit of 0.005 ETH should be enough.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi dennisch123,  Thanks for the message. We are trying to update the community on a regular basis. Here is the post from March, 06:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2448767.msg31702038#msg31702038  and March 16 in this thread:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2448767.msg32429080#msg32429080   The tokens are planned to be issued by March, 30. We could not issue them right away as some users needed some time to pass KYC and we had to make final calculations. In regards to the token value, it is fixed in ETH during the token sale.  Feel free to join the Announcement Telegram channel: https://t.me/RentberryNews to get timely updates.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Dear All!   We are glad to share with you some details about the ICO and some of our new features.  We’ve developed and implemented  the token payment option. Once all the tokens are issued, every BERRY holder will be able to take advantage of his tokens inside our ecosystem.  We also want to announce that every time you pay for one of our services with tokens, you pay only half of the regular services pricing!  Our team constantly works on making your rental experience better, so that’s why we released the Open House Scheduling feature.  We wanted to design the most convenient and efficient way of interaction between the landlord and a tenant to make it easier to schedule a house tour. Now you can schedule a tour in a few clicks and check out the apartment you liked on Rentberry in real life without the need of back and forth calls and unnecessary e-mails.  Read more about our product updates and recent ICO results by the link:  https://rentberry.com/blog/update-march-2018   We have also created our Announcement Channel.  Please, feel free to join it to track Rentberry's progress and check our latest news: https://t.me/RentberryNews

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Dear Rentberry Community,   The ICO has ended and we have great news - the Hard Cap of $30m was successfully reached!   Important information for BERRY token holders   BERRY tokens will be issued and will be available for transfer in your account on Cryptonomos site within 30 days after the token sale only if you have successfully passed KYC. You can easily check the status in your Profile on Cryptonomos (https://cryptonomos.com/profile), where "Verified user" means that you are all set to get BERRY.  You will be able to send BERRY to any ERC-20 compatible wallet such as My Ethereum Wallet. Please, be informed that the fee would be required to transfer tokens. The minimum deposit of 0.005 ETH should be enough.  Please, find the detailed guide on how to transfer tokens from Cryptonomos to MEW: https://medium.com/cryptonomos/a-how-to-guide-for-transferring-tokens-from-the-cryptonomos-platform-to-myetherwallet-774a42ce6262  Feel free to contact us in Telegram: https://t.me/rentberry or by email support@rentberry.com  We have also created our Announcement Channel.  Please, feel free to join it to track Rentberry's progress and check our latest news: https://t.me/RentberryNews

Author: holyterror
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi @Rentberry,  Just a few questions:  1.What is stopping websites or Airbnb from releasing their own cryptocurrency and copying your business model? 2. Do you intend to have a trading pair of BERRY and fiat ? Or else BERRY price will forever be pegged to ETH or BTC. 3. Does Rentberry have a patent to protect its business model or tech ?

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello holyterror,  Thanks for your questions and interest in Rentberry. The Rentberry Auctioning Technology is part of what we believe to be the platform’s unique intellectual property, and we are currently in the process of filing for patent protection.We are planning that both BERRY and fiat will be used, however some options like covering renting security deposits will be available for BERRY only.

Author: adamq01
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Immediately thought of the potential benefits of your project when I read this article...  https://www.theaustralian.com.au/national-affairs/treasury/capitalgains-sting-by-tax-office-for-airbnb-hosts/news-story/1d90e9c73b25a13c7d5c9472b3cdda96  Poor punters have been stung with a massive CGT bill which far exceeded their rental income. This was triggered when they sold the property and it became clear they had had a rental income from Airbnb.  Given the current uncertainty around tax rules, I guess not taking fiat would be a smart first move. Get paid in crypto and keep the wealth in crypto. Not clear at this stage whether this would be a taxable event but definitely better than getting cash...

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello Jakobslander, In order to pass KYC the following information would be needed: name, address, date of birth, copy of ID (passport or driver license). The information you should provide during KYC is considered as “Personal Data" and is processed in accordance with the Data Protection Act 2004. The data you enter needs to be checked and verified by our partner Onfido and by no means will be used or disclosed by Cryptonomos.  If you need any details on this, please let us know by email to support@rentberry.com.

Author: Bit_fan_talks
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: So US citizen here, let me tell you about my refund experience. Once they announced that US residents can no longer participate due to the legal issues (something with SEC regulations, I don’t really care), I decided to get a refund. Once KYC became live, I passed it pretty quick and got my ETH back from Cryptonomus, there is simply nothing bad I can say about how they handled my refund process. Why the hell would I care if they are from Russia or somewhere else as long as they handle their business well? As for your KYC and stolen identity concerns, you are acting weird. They use Onfido and it makes the whole KYC process completely safe and secure. They were noted by Forbes, TechCrunch, BusinessInsider, The Telegraph, etc.. It’s a well-known company and if they back Rentberry, Cryptonomus or anyone else, it’s the biggest guarantee that you’ll get a secure KYC experience.

Author: IMJim
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Just to be clear to all that may be wondering similar, it wasn't the information they asked for that set off my radar.  What they are requiring information wise is standard KYC stuff, I also still think RentBerry is a legitimate project....however who they have involved in managing their funds and KYC information is where things get really weird for me, enough so that I am willing to refuse any further involvement and continue to waste precious time.  If you are a victim of identify theft of any kind, I can totally understand why you would be so concerned after reading about my experience here....THAT is my major concern here.  RentBerry says they are only using a well know identify verification company called Onida, however it is Cryptonomos and their site that is first collecting this information.  RentBerry has now told me on several occasions, including several times here publicly for all to see that Cryptonomos is not supposed to have access to the information being collected for the KYC, with no exceptions right....claiming they are strictly following protocols of the data privacy protection act.   I have supplied them with undeniable proof of Cryptonomos staff asking for screenshots of the form you fill out with all of this PRIVATE information, with it "filled out completely", verbatim!  Upon looking into this Cryptonomos company I found, or should i say I didn't find a single shred of evidence showing them to be a real company....only thing I could uncover is that they are out of Russia...post no address of their so called company anywhere online that I could find....and well, are allowing their staff to request private information directly from customers/investors that their company is not even supposed to have, see or touch.  To say this voids their claim that they are strictly adhering to the privacy protection act, is putting it mildly.  Funny thing is in all the communication over this, both in Email and here on BCT...they have completely ignored this enormous breach of security and have refused to comment on it.....but again I have very clear cut proof of this activity lol.  I have insisted that if they insist I must provide this information just to get refunded my own money, a major joke in and of its self right....that they provide me secure means of supplying directly to Onida so my information is not in the hands of this very shady looking so called company in Russia, nothing of course on that either.  The also claim I must wait 2 months till this stupid thing ends in order to get my ETH back, Cryptonomos claims that refund would be automatic however RentBerry's terms clearly state you must request it and they are providing a short window of time when it ends to do so....this to me smells a bit funny, like why on earth would you need to process a KYC for an investor you are saying cannot participate (this news came to me 2 weeks after they took my funds right...that they all of a sudden required a KYC)....but you'll refund at end of ICO without it lol.  They have also refused to comment on the changing of ICO terms after taking investment, I believe this too to very problematic, questionable and possibly outright illegal.  These terms again were not posted on Cryptonomos when I invested, but were posted 2 weeks after....this is what initially raised a red flag for me that inspired me to look into this company, that day is when I had Email communication with them requesting I supply them with a screenshot of this information....that REALLY set of my radar right.

Body: At the moment seems this ICO is just for collecting funds for development of internal system virtual currency. However it's not clear what investors will get back in return. Currently all investors are putting their funds to internal currency and at the moment only way to earn from this investment I see is to sell this token to person who actually will spent it for this platform services. Let's say I'm about to invest $10 and in return from current rate ( 0.0004 eth per token ) I'll get 20 BERRY tokens.  As we do know internal currencies tends to have less price value so than actual currency ( let's say it's 30%-40% ) but not having actual services prices using this token makes even hard to calculate possible return from this ICO.  Anyways, all the best with this ICO.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Dear IMJim,  We understand your frustration in regards to the process of passing KYC.  KYC cannot be handled directly by Rentberry as we don't have recourses for global identity verification. Please, be informed that we are using Onfido to verify participants, it's leading identity verification provider. Also, all the personal information is not being stored by Cryptonomos during the KYC, it's being only checked by Onfido to verify the identity.  If you have any questions or additional comments on this issue, please don't hesitate to contact us by email to support@rentberry.com

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello etrane79, Thanks for your interest in Rentberry token sale. We will try to place the answers below:  The value of the token is determined due to various factors on the market. We are not going to predict the price, however, some expected fees in fiat vc BRRY coins are described in Whitepaper.  BERRY is a utility token. Token holder will not receive any profit sharing, dividends or equity in the company. The purpose of the BERRY token is to make rental experience more efficient. The whole Rentberry platform will be tokenized. Tenants and landlords will be able to perform numerous transactions on the platform much faster, more secure and cheaper than before. For example, tenants will be able to pay for rental applications using BERRY tokens and landlords will be able to use BERRY tokens to promote their properties, etc. The payment in BERRY tokens will be much cheaper than the equivalent payment in fiat (for example, tenants can pay $9.99 for rental application in fiat or equivalent of $4.99 in BERRY tokens). But the main purpose of BERRY token is helping tenants to save millions in rental deposits. Community members (can be anyone) can use tokens to back financially tenants and receive rewards in return (interest rate).

Author: etrane79
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I have a few questions that will help me to decide wether to get involved or not. I've read the white pages etc....and they don't clearly address a few things. My first question is how are you evaluating the rentberry token in terms of its Fiat value? I see that you offer the ability to purchase rentberry tokens in the form of Bitcoin or Ethereum but with the volatility of both depending on when you make your investment makes the value of a berry token from one individual to next can vastly different.  I believe I saw somewhere that you were roughly equating one Berry token to be the equal of $0.26 USD. That was in December now that comes out to roughly $0.45 usd a berry token. Once you've implemented the token system what are you going to be valuing the token at?   I also read that the token is primarily to be used within your system and any trading outside is not condoned though it may happen. I also read that you don't want speculators buying tokens and dumping them after the Ico, and primaly you want them to be used on your platform. As an investor/ homeowner why would I want a berry token? Where is the gain to an investor.  I read that you're going to be using the berry token and Fiat as acceptable payment through the rentberry platform but it seems to me that the Berry would have to be a stable price in order for the consumer to actually find it feasible to use. I could be wrong about this but I also thought I read that once the Ico is over you will not be creating anymore Berry tokens. If that's the case who is the consumer purchasing the berry token from? Will that come from us the initial Ico investors? I'm using the term investor Loosely because again I'm not sure where the investment/ROI part comes into play.  The other part that confuses me is the part where you say that you want the initial Ico buyers to use the rentberry token on the platform but why would I prebuy a token at very volatile cryptocurrency phase when later on down the road I could just buy berry token at the stable price on the platform. Again the price has to be stable or why would the consumer use it? Why would I buy a 50 Cent USD Berry token one day when it could be valued at $0.26 USD the next day?  As an investor I find the project very intriguing but the berry token part of this very vague. I'm not looking for you guys to guarantee that my investment has a big Roi but I'm also not seeing where it has any Roi at all maybe you guys can help me understand this a little bit.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi g8stTDas,  The Rentberry community (tenants, landlords, friends, family or even Rentberry itself) will have the ability to utilize their BERRY tokens to cover a portion of rental security deposits for selected tenants in exchange for rewards in the form of BERRY tokens (i.e., an interest rate type return, paid in BERRY tokens, as a reward for having funded part of the security deposit). This will allow otherwise-qualified tenants who might otherwise not be able to afford a security deposit to rent an apartment, and by having others contribute to their security deposit, providing them with better reputational and financial credibility with potential landlords. This will also give landlords access to a larger pool of qualified applicants and increase their ability to rent apartments.  On average, we expect community members to receive rewards in excess of 5% of the amount that they cover

Our goal is to have the actual users buying tokens, who will use them on the platform.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello, As Rentberry evolves, the platform will allow tenants and landlords to rate each other by submitting reviews, and will also allow both parties to assess each other by reference to those reviews and an immutable record of rental activity stored on the blockchain. This information, coupled with publicly available data (e.g., credit reports, background checks, etc.), will be analyzed and processed by Rentberry’s proprietary scoring technology.  You may find detailed info in Whitepaper.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: The scoring system is a statistical screening method, as tenant and landlord data made available to Rentberry is used to generate a score between 100 and 1,000. Potential risks will be reflected in these scores. The higher the score of a tenant, the lower the risk for a landlord to experience a default or damage to the property. The higher the score of a landlord, the greater the chance for a tenant to build a long-lasting rental relationship on mutually beneficial terms.  The system will be solely used within Rentberry. Please, find more details in Whitepaper.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi Stephlambert,  The purpose of the BERRY token is to make rental experience more efficient. The whole Rentberry platform will be tokenized. Tenants and landlords will be able to perform numerous transactions on the platform much faster, more secure and cheaper than before. For example, tenants will be able to pay for rental applications using BERRY tokens and landlords will be able to use BERRY tokens to promote their properties, etc. The payment in BERRY tokens will be much cheaper than the equivalent payment in fiat (for example, tenants can pay $9.99 for rental application in fiat or equivalent of $4.99 in BERRY tokens).  But the main purpose of BERRY token is helping tenants to save millions in rental deposits. Community members (can be anyone) can use tokens to back financially tenants and receive rewards in return (interest rate).

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi, BERRY is utility token, so no dividends to participants are provided.  The purpose of the BERRY token is to make rental experience more efficient. The whole Rentberry platform will be tokenized. Tenants and landlords will be able to perform numerous transactions on the platform much faster, more secure and cheaper than before. For example, tenants will be able to pay for rental applications using BERRY tokens and landlords will be able to use BERRY tokens to promote their properties, etc. The payment in BERRY tokens will be much cheaper than the equivalent payment in fiat (for example, tenants can pay $9.99 for rental application in fiat or equivalent of $4.99 in BERRY tokens).  But the main purpose of BERRY token is helping tenants to save millions in rental deposits. Community members (can be anyone) can use tokens to back financially tenants and receive rewards in return (interest rate).

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: We are convinced that blockchain technology combined with smart contracts will be the core engine for the long-term rental industry. The blockchain provides a mechanism for securing and transferring funds, and supporting the complex multi-party agreements that drive those fund transfers through the use of smart contracts. The data will remain saved in an immutable distributed data store means that users can rest assured that their data cannot be tampered with, payment flows will be optimized, identity will be managed securely, and ultimately the overall rental experience will be improved.  Please check out the Whitepaper where you will be able to find the detailed description on why tokenization and blockchain are required in long-term rental industry.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello Felluck,  Thanks for your feedback and trust. Rentberry is in long-term rental space, so we do not compete with airbnb.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: We at Rentberry aim to make the auctioning technology transparent and ensure it will provide with fair competition. Moreover, the technology solves many essential tasks, such as: Reducing vacancy rates by seamlessly addressing pricing in depressed market conditions; Capitalizing on hot markets by extracting the most value from their properties; Selecting tenants based on data points beyond the amount they are willing to pay.  In addition, it’s needed to add that we are backed by highly experienced legal teams, including Latham & Watkins LLP (general corporate counsel) and RedBrick IP and of course we will thoroughly check the rules of the country of expansion before entering the market.

Author: makebitcoincash
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I was taking a look through Rentberry token sale terms and whitepaper. Big red flags (at least to me) appeared  . Asking for wallet private key which I would never give out and would avoid anyone who would ask. I'll be giving this a pass.  Straight out of their token sale terms:  "Contributions to be made in ETH must be sent from an Ethereum wallet in respect of which you can identify your private key. Your private key shall be required to verify your ETH contribution to Rentberry and to enable Rentberry to issue BERRY Tokens to you through the Smart Contract System."  -Similar in regards to bitcoin contributions.  "Risk of Losing Access to BERRY Tokens Due to Loss of Private Key(s). BERRY Tokens purchased by you may be held in a digital wallet or vault, which requires a private key or a combination of private keys for access. Accordingly, loss of requisite private key(s) associated with your digital wallet or vault storing BERRY Tokens will result in loss of such BERRY Tokens, as well as access to your BERRY Token balance. Moreover, any third party that gains access to such private key(s), including by gaining access to login credentials of a hosted wallet or vault service you use, may be able to misappropriate your BERRY Tokens. Rentberry is not responsible for any such losses."   I would advise anyone to use Extreme Caution as we all should know to never trust anyone with our private keys.  You have been warn, but if you really want to participate even after reading this: the least you should do is set up and use a new secondary wallet. Then, deposit into the secondary wallet only the amount that you wish to contribute. Added protection to anyone participating, transfer tokens right away if distributed. Be safe and good luck.  Rentberry TS Terms: https://rentberry.cryptonomos.com/downloads/Rentberry_Terms_of_Token_Sale.pdf

Author: paycum2
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I dont really get it, maybe because im a european, so can someone please clearify the following:  is auctioning for rental prizes normal in the USA? I ask this as i have read that they want to expand to europe. BUT, in europe almost all countries have rules and protection for both buyers and sellers. Rental prices can not be auctioned as prices are fixed based on appartment size, condition and stuff like that. In most european countries its highly illegal to do such auctions: you can not ask person A to pay - for example - 1000 a month, and ask person B to pay 300. Thats illegal. We have a point system here which checks the total size, amount of rooms and things like that. based of that outcome there will be a fixed prize range you can use. You can not ask 100k a month for an appartment that is worth 1k a month, even if the demand skyrockets.  So even if the rules in usa are different i see some problems with their "expanding to europe" goals. Sure not all countries here have the same rules, but a succesful usa system doesnt mean its going to be succesful here. Amazon, Uber, Ebay. VISA, Mastercard, they all failed here, nobody uses them here.  there is no transparancy in current offline market, and it cost a lot of headaches for both buyers and sellers? Again, here in most european countries when a house owner tries to rent his appartment through a third party, that third party can not ask any fee to the person who is going to rent the appartment. That is highly illegal. The fee has to be arranged between the owner and the third party. So, no problems at all. The whole renting market is already transparant here, so i dont see the problem. I do however see problems with Rentberry. They can not ask for a fee to their users here, thats not legal (but ok they probably find a way around this by charging paid access to the website's services or things like that).  And when i read these things: "Rentberry charges users a $25 fee, but in the future, it plans to charge 25 percent of the difference between the asking price and the agreed upon rent. Whoever received the better deal pays the fee -- every month." i just see a company who tries to make as much money over peoples backs. Dont get me wrong, making money with your business is good, but when you say things like "taking away the middleman," while basically you are adding Rentberry as a "new" middleman (who fills his pockets with even more money), then you dont solve a problem, you create a new problem.  why would anyone even use such token/blockchain system? Most people dont even know what bitcoin is! It will take years before regular people will trust things like this, and when it comes to houses, people are very careful.  Startup creating new startup? Also i see that Rentberry has been around since 2015, so basically its still a startup. No problem with that, but a startup wanting to transform into another startup sounds kind of strange/worrying. In my opinion this basically means the first idea failed, or, they start a new idea without completing the old one, which doesnt have to be bad, but it tells something about the people behind it.  The current userbase looks great, but can i find some stats on how realistic those numbers are? I mean, not to be negative, but i can see that the Rentberry ico marketing team is great, as (bought)news coverages are shown everywhere (yet another reason for red flags as basically all news coverage seems to be paid ones), so how can we be sure that all those nice stories and shown numbers are real? I can easily create a fake 120k customerbase with some easy advertising campaigns just to make it look good on the outside. Im not saying Rentberry's data is fake, but are those customers just people who signed up by email (and like almost all email signups, never look at it again) or are they really using your platform on a daily base? If yes you should be able to show us a lot of statistics.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

If someone was able to get 2500 coins for ETH when it was ~440 USD why would I want to invest ~880USD to get the same amount of coins while in the same stage of the bonus during ICO? Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: How This Platform Intends to Foster Trust Between Landlords and Tenants  Rentberry is a decentralized rental firm that unites landlords and tenants at one platform with means of blockchain technology. With the well-established business since 2015, this online marketplace facilitates the organized listing of the properties by landlords and prospective bidding by the renters on such listing.  The network streamlines the process of a rental industry by placing the history of tenant’s credit scores in front of the landlords and property details in front of tenants.  The platform expands its service almost 120 thousand active users across 1000 cities of US including New York, Miami, and Los Angeles and other countries like England, Germany, Canada, China and more. Furthermore, the company intends to widen its service across Europe and Asia by 2019.  Read more: https://coinidol.com/rentberry-to-foster-trust-between-landlords-and-tenants/

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: No, you would just need to provide information by submitting the forms online. We perform the identity checks for both Tenants and Landlords to avoid scam. This way we make sure the Landlords get the applications from verified Tenants only, as well as the Tenants are sure the property is added by real verified Landlords.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry is not website which only classifies ads like most of its competitors like Craigslist, Zillow, Rightmove etc. It's a close-loop rental platform which fulfills all the rental tasks in one place:  • Searching for properties; • Making offers / bids via the Rentberry auctioning platform; • Screening prospects; • Selecting the best / most suitable candidates; • Negotiating the terms; • Unlocking rental security deposits; • E-signing contracts; • Paying rent; • Submitting maintenance requests; • Hiring third-party service providers (e.g., handymen and plumbers); and • Enabling landlords to stay connected with tenants.  We already have a functional platform and marketplace with actual users and properties which allow fo most of these transactions.

Author: askon
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: The main idea of this system is evaluation of renters and landlords in order to determine the most optimal rent in a particular case. But in fact, the application of this methodology is much broader than it seems to be. Assessments of this system can be used beyond Rentberry.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

Author: CHRISBIN702
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Check it out, guys. I know the recent real estate type ICOs have been a huge letdown. I see potential here though. First and foremost, lowering the cost of rent and at the same time increasing the profit for homeowners(landlords). How, you ask? Simple. Cutting out the middleman. Isn't that what the ICO and blockchain technology is all about? By removing the overpriced property management companies from the equation, the landlord is able to competitively list a property. As long as there is a section built into the platform for maintenance requests, approvals, and work complete verification for paying the invoices of vendors and handymen. The landlord can operate a rental property from across the world.

Author: iamdjm
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Going through the T&Cs. How should i interpret the below paragraphs? Does it mean BERRY will not be on an exchange ever? Once i have bought the Tokens and vesting period has passed, i can never exchange them back to ETH and get out?? Can someone please clarify.  BERRY Tokens do not have any functionality or utility outside the Rentberry Platform.  The functionality and utility of Berry Tokens will therefore be limited to interacting with users/content within the confines of a single platform. BERRY Tokens will not have any functionality or utility outside the Rentberry Platform. It is therefore intended that BERRY Tokens will continuously circulate within the Rentberry Platform ecosystem. The Rentberry Platform will therefore be structured as a “closed system” insofar as the use of BERRY Tokens is concerned. Whilst it is possible that a secondary market could develop for trading BERRY Tokens, the Company will not create such secondary markets nor will it act as an exchange for BERRY Tokens. To the extent a secondary market or exchange for trading BERRY Tokens does develop, it would be run and operated wholly independently of the Company, the BERRY Token Sale and the Rentberry Platform.  Possibility of change to the intended functionality of BERRY Tokens PLEASE NOTE THAT WE ARE IN THE PROCESS OF UNDERTAKING A LEGAL AND REGULATORY ANALYSIS OF THE FUNCTIONALITY OF BERRY TOKENS. FOLLOWING THE CONCLUSION OF THIS ANALYSIS, WE MAY DECIDE TO AMEND THE INTENDED FUNCTIONALITY OF BERRY TOKENS IN ORDER TO ENSURE COMPLIANCE WITH ANY LEGAL OR REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS TO WHICH WE ARE SUBJECT. WE SHALL PUBLISH A NOTICE ON OUR WEBSITE OF ANY CHANGES THAT WE DECIDE TO MAKE TO THE FUNCTIONALITY OF BERRY TOKENS AND IT IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY TO REGULARLY CHECK OUR WEBSITE FOR ANY SUCH NOTICES. ON THE CONLCUSION OF THIS ANALYSIS, WE WILL DECIDE WHETHER OR NOT TO CHANGE THE FUNCTIONALITY OF BERRY TOKENS.

The ICO is going great but we specifically will not show it early (if ICO will still run to that stage 😉 - as we do not want speculators taking advantage of it. Our goal is to have the actual users buying tokens who will use them on the platform and not someone who is looking for hype and then sell them after the ICO. Therefore if you want to participate please do.

Author: Rigorous
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Cauchy asked a very good question. This is the point where you have to read the whitepaper very closely.  Total Supply: Initially 400 million BERRY tokens are allocated to the Token Sale. The final amount will depend on the bonuses that would be applied to the token sale. All unsold tokens will be burned.  • 70% of BERRY tokens to be allocated to the Token Sale; • 20% of BERRY tokens to be created will be part of the Rentberry Reserve and will be retained by Rentberry, as described below; • 10% of BERRY tokens to be created will be distributed to Rentberry’s founders and employees  Suppose they sell 50%. 200 million tokens are allocated to the investors. The total supply to be created is 200 M / 0.70 = 285.7 M. 10% (28.57 M) of the total goes to the team and 20% (57.14 M) goes into the Rentberry Reserve.  The calculation is slightly off because I did not take bonuses into account.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

This project wants to improve the real estate rental area with the help of new technologies. But this entails a matter of trust in the project itself. The value of tokens as a means of payment will depend only on the existence of this company. It is not decentralization, but centralization. So there is both positive and the negative sides.

Author: johannes___
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I got blocked from the rentberry telegram group for writing the following. They will block me here again I suppose but I'll try it anyway:  Great report hemi picto!!! its about time somebody points out the huge risks involved in investing into startups! nobody is talking about the fundamentals anymore. with a coin you don't even own a share of the company.  and why should the value of the rentberry token rise im value? landlords and tenants who buy tokens to do some deals on the plattform must be sure that the value of the coin stays the same over time. otherwise an application costs 20$ in march and 350$ in july. who would want to use such a volatile renting plattform?  and what about the revenue pf rentberry. they say they have processed 4k of applications. if we calculate 100$ per application thats 400k $ revenue in one year? that's really nothing! so that could be a reason why they have to raise the money through an ico because no real silicon valley vc wanted to give them more than 4 mil. & money which is really nothing if you want to build a serious company.  remember air bnb has raised 3 BILLION $ during the last years to get where it is today! and has another 1 billion $ as line of credit. so please compare 4 million to 3 billion $! why would you give your money to a company which is obviously underfunded? without a serious amount of vc funding like 200 or 300 million $ rentberry will be out of business within 12 to 18 month in such a highly competitive market! they have to spend millions in advertising and discounts to reach a broader audience and to buy new customers.  Please Alex answer those two questions honestly: 1. How much is the monthly cash burn of rentberry? 2. How long would the runway of rentberry be without the gains from the ico?

Author: Ackedy
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I think that the use of the credit bureaus for such service is unacceptable. After all, none of the modern credit bureaus do not take into account people’s connection with properties renting, so they can't evaluate a person for the industry. It is a pity that the developers Rentberry didn't consider it when they were working on the project.

Author: Immer
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: You're absolutely right that the credit bureaus are not suitable for evaluating people for the industry of rental real estate. That is why the platform will not use their data in its work. The project will develop its own scoring system that will collect data about activities in Rentberry, renters and landlords, forming a single rating, which can be viewed by other users.

Author: Ackedy
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Sounds good. I’m interested, in what countries you should rent property, so the that system works?

Author: Immer
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: The Scoring System will work on the territory of any state. For example: if the user has previously rented the property only in the USA, formed the rating will work, if he needed to rent an apartment, for example, in Germany. Modern credit bureaus, basically, operate only on the territory of one country, so their scores are not valid on the territory of other states. This is one of the main benefits of Scoring System.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Dear Cherrywins, Thanks for your questions. Our comments are below:  1. The individual score will be based on data from many sources, including information from applications, previous payment performance, history of evictions, bankruptcy records, data and scores from credit bureaus, past due accounts and others.  2. We understand your point. The legal relationship between landlord and tenant are regulated by the applicable law and an agreement e-signed by the parties, but not by the platform itself. In the example you provided, Rentberry won't be able to decide whether that sofa is damaged or not. The dispute should be solved in a legal framework.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello Shaurman,  Thanks for your interest. All the rental process using Rentberry is fast and inexpensive comparing to other platforms. After you find the property you like and make sure it is available for rent, you need to submit the application which costs $9.99 only. The application includes the fees for credit score and background report already.  There is also an option to use our proprietary auctioning technology, so you can make a custom offer to your landlord and pay the negotiated rent. After the landlord accepts your application and you e-sign the agreement all is set and no additional fees are required. You will be able to pay rentals with no hidden commissions.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi NeverCrypt, Thanks for your questions. Rentberry is going to provide with more services underpinned by far more complex technologies. Let us give you a few examples:  1. The Rentberry ecosystem will offer the ability for community members to help back quality tenants which will be built on blockchain, smart contracts and the BERRY tokens for verifiability and efficiency;  2. The second example is the proprietary auctioning technology which reduces traditional frustrations, scam rates, time delays, and friction points in the rental process to benefit both tenants and landlords;  3. Essentially, Rentberry is the first company in the long-term residential real estate space that will operate internationally and ensure a fair, frictionless, and seamless long-term rental process for all parties involved.  In regards to dispute resolution, all the negotiated terms should be specified in the Rental Agreement which is e-signed by both parties via Rentberry website. This Agreement will have a legal value in case the landlord and the tenant have an argument.  We hope we have clarified your questions. If you have any further, please let us know.

Author: S3cco
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Rentberry – A Fully-Operational Home Rental Platform Powered by Blockchain https://bitcoingarden.org/rentberry-fully-operational-home-rental-platform-powered-blockchain/  Founded in San Francisco in 2015, Rentberry has established itself as a successful business operating in the real estate industry. The company managed to attract $4 mln from top-tier investors and VC funds like Jade Value (China), 808 Ventures (Australia), Zing Capital (Canada), and more. The platform helps thousands of landlords to find quality tenants for their rentals and, consequently, assist tenants in their pursuit of a perfect rental home.  Nearly all the industries have already been transformed by technologies, but long-term renting still relies on old-school practices that are neither cost-effective nor transparent and secure. Rentberry is designed to leverage this trend and make both landlords and tenants enjoy their rental experience.  According to a recent study conducted by Harvard University, the percentage of renters has increased among all income groups, age groups, and household types. According to projections of the Urban Institute, about 59% of new households to be formed by 2030 will choose renting over buying. Renting has become the new normal and there are grounds to assume that this trend will be gaining momentum...

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Dear Cherrywins, Thank you for your interest in Rentberry and your remark. As you know we are in the process of preparing to ICO and we are getting hundreds of questions daily in different channels.  Getting back to your questions, our scoring ecosystem based on blockchain technology will allow to create an individual score for each tenant. As the score will be based on data from many sources, the lack of US credit history would still allow you to rent an apartment without a problem.  After the deposit is collected, the Tenant transfers it to the Security Deposit Smart Contract. When the tenant moves out, if there has not been a damage claim by the landlord, the Security Deposit Smart Contract will transfer BERRY tokens that have been deposited back to the tenant and to each contributor deposit.  All the negotiated terms should be specified in the Rental Agreement which is e-signed by both parties via Rentberry website. This Agreement will have a legal value and can be used in case the landlord and the tenant have an argument.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Sure, we are aware that the communication between tenants and landlords does not end at the conclusion of the agreement. The built-in messenger is implemented and is being successfully used by thousands of Rentberry users.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Rentberry – the Modern Approach to Long-Term Renting  Rentberry was founded in 2015 and has achieved great success in the blockchain industry so far. Rentberry successfully raised $4M from high-profile investors and VC funds from 11 countries and 19 US states. Currently, the platform operates all across the US and has more than 120k users and 224k properties. The company has plans to expand to Europe and Asia in the next few years.  What Exactly Rentberry Does?  Rentberry is a transparent home rental service and a price negotiation platform uniting tenants and landlords. Powered by blockchain technology and smart contracts, it automates the entire long-term rental process for both parties while saving them money, time, and effort. Apart from providing online solutions to all rental tasks, Rentberry allows for crowdsourcing of rental security deposits, which unblocks billions of dollars frozen in rental security deposits around the world.  More: https://coinidol.com/rentberry-modern-approach-to-long-term-renting/

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello. I saw in your white paper information that in early 2018 you plan to introduce the opportunity to pay rent with BERRY coins, to let users to stop to use cash and bank cards. Did I understand correctly that then the options of paying for renting real estate with fiat money will be excluded from the service?

Author: Immer
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I really like the fact that Renberry plans to establish important cooperation so that users could pay even for utility services with coins of the project. I wonder how long after the launch of the platform there will be such an opportunity.

Author: arakx
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Good afternoon. Can investors expect to receive any bonuses during the ICO?

Author: rocketbit48
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Yes, each investor will be able to receive from 13 to 33% bonus when buying BERRY coins.

Author: spacegt
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I read the description of the project and I was glad to find out that there will be additional service providers on the platform, with whom it will be possible to contact and make a deal quickly. But I was disappointed because of the fact that they can’t be calculated in BERRY coins. In my opinion, it would be convenient for a renter and save his time for. I hope that someday developers will implement such an option.

Author: termonator61
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello, friend! And why do you think that users won’t be able to pay to third-party service providers with BERRY coins? In fact, the developers focus on it! The coolest thing about this is that any user can order the necessary services using a smartphone and immediately pay for them with tokens. A user doesn’t need to look for anyone, negotiate the amount of payment. All this is solved in advance; everything is as convenient as possible.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Thanks for your comment. We certainly understand that each country has its own ins and outs in terms of rental market and we are going to take it into account when expanding. Next year we are going to start the international expansion with New Zealand, Australia, Canada and other developed countries. We are getting lots of emails from potential users all over the world with words of support and we are sure we’ll meet their expectations.

Author: spacegt
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello. I theory was like this because I didn’t find any information about it on the official website of the project. I want to say that you made me very happy. I just wanted extra services to be quickly ordered via the platform and paid with BERRY coins. I'm just wondering how any, for example, cleaning company will set up reception of crypto-currency as payment.

Author: nextwalker
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: The idea with smart locks is just wonderful!!! But I immediately had a question, if a renter’s smartphone is stolen, he won’t be able to get home without hindrance. Have developers already worked this point out and how do they want to solve it?

Author: termonator61
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Unfortunately, there’s no information on this question yet. I think that Rentberry will help to solve the additional service providers' technical problems related to the connection of payment by crypto-currencies. In general, it would be great if Rentberry created themselves small companies that provided various services to users of the service. Then they would be able to reach the minimum cost of services and don’t waste their time connecting these companies to their project and carrying out full control over all actions, assess quality and promptly improving the things that made customer to be discontent.

Author: kentuckykid
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: In some countries, legal entities themselves rent real estate for their employees who are sent on a business trip. Does anyone know will legal persons be able to work in Rentberry in order to rent real estate for their staff?

Author: deort
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Wow, you have elaborated on all the issues very cool. I hope that developers will listen to you, it would really make the service better. I’ve found this project 30 minutes ago and since you are discussing such a topic, do you know what commission will the platform charge when paying for services from third-party companies?

Author: dayasinfo
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello everyone. Does anyone know if there be a restriction on the minimum period of rent of property ob the platform? I often go on a business trips to the US and I would be interested in the option of renting an apartment or a small house for 10-14 days.

Author: dayasinfo
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: And I liked more the fact that tokens could be used to pay for services of third-party companies. By the way, does anyone know, will I be able to independently engage service providers on the platform or are only agents can negotiate with them?

Author: Immer
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Good day, everybody. If I can’t phone the landlord, can I contact him on the platform via the chat?

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Good afternoon, everybody. Tell me please, if I lease a property via Rentberry, what information can I find out about the tenant who was interested in my offer?

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Greetings, comrades! Tell me please, how much tokens can I get if I spend 1 Ethereum?

Author: kentuckykid
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello. You can get 1500 BERRY for this sum and 15 more coins as a bonus.
