Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello everybody. You know, I'm a very busy person and I don’t have time to track the market value of renting a property. Will there be any automatic algorithm in Rentberry that will be able to change the cost of renting my property in accordance with market trends?

Author: bit679
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Greetings. I will need to pay a deposit of 1000 BERRY coins at the beginning of cooperation with the landlord. I'm just worried that we won’t agree with him, and I can lose my coins.

Author: CAraBuss
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hello. I think that if you don’t make an agreement with him, then you will definitely get back the funds that you left as a deposit. Perhaps, there is the mechanism with the deposit introduced, so the creditor immediately has the confidence to you as a renter.

Author: bit679
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I have nothing against a deposit, and if it’s returned to me, if we haven’t entered into cooperation, then I am glad. Although, I’ve read that when transferring a deposit, the platform charges 50 coins as a commission. Does it mean that I can only get 950 coins back?

Author: CAraBuss
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: No, the platform guarantees the return of all 1000 coins in case you didn’t manage to enter into cooperation with the lessor. Therefore, you don’t have to worry that your 50 BERRY tokens will disappear without a trace.

Author: sinfazat22ron
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: But the system with the deposit isn’t clear to me at all. Why make a deposit, if at the first appeal there is no risk of fraud? And anyway, as far as I understand, all the work will be done via smart contracts, and with them there is generally zero probability that one of the parties will deceive the other one.

Author: CAraBuss
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: And why do you mention fraud and deception? This is not an advance payment. The renter contributes 1000 coins to access the user's personal data, his work history on the platform, and other advertisements. According to these data, the renter can understand whether he wants to cooperate with this landlord or not. If he agrees, then the 1000 coins deposited remain with the lessor in the value of the future lease of real estate.

Author: sallgast
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: A good idea. There is a problem in the market and you see the ways to solve it. Good luck to you.

Author: specialAU
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Sounds good, because then users won’t need to waste their time on this. And how much will such services cost, is not it specified anywhere? I'm just wondering if their cost will be lower than the market one or not.

Author: woodcoin
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: I’ve read that your security service will involved in each transaction. Can you elaborate on this question? What options will it perform when making transactions between the renter and the landlord?

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Hi, thanks for your question. We perform the identity checks for both Tenants and Landlords to avoid scam. All the private data entered is secured and strictly confidential. The data submitted by Tenants is checked by Experian. The data submitted by Landlords is checked by our secure partner. This way we make sure the Landlords get the applications from verified Tenants only, as well as the Tenants are sure the property is added by real verified Landlords.

Author: _ko33TPas
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM

Anyone with an account can submit information to your page, so we are reaching out to this community to get you all involved in the discussion. Thanks! (PS: Team welcome to add sale details)

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Based on the research conducted by the US Census Bureau, there are 46M rental housing units in the US alone. We can at least mupliply this number by the average price for renting an appartment. As for worldwide, I've seen the numbers around 0.7B rental units in the reports conducted by MSCI and CBRE. So we are talking about trillion of dollars.

Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Thanks for your question. BERRY tokens will be tradable after the completion of the ICO, which is planned for Feb 28. At the moment, we are finalizing our discussions with the top exchanges to list BERRY tokens on their platforms.

Author: thelastofas
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: We believe that finding the smartest application of the technology is key to success. Here at Rentberry, we are using blockchain to allow for crowdsourcing of rental security deposits, which will unfreeze nearly $500 billion that are now locked in security deposits around the globe.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Thanks for asking. In less than two years, Rentberry has grown into a nationwide platform and now it covers 4,948 cities across the US. We have more than 224K property listings and nearly 120K users. What's more, we have successfully raised $4 mln from top-tier investors from 11 countries and 19 US states.

Author: thelastofas
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Thanks for your question. Rentberry is designed for renting, not buying properties. So if your goal is to secure a perfect long-term rental in the US, then yes, Rentberry can cover the entire process for you.

Author: rentberry
Title: RENTBERRY - DECENTRALIZED HOME RENTAL PLATFORM
Body: Yes, we are planning to partner with utility providers to let our users pay their utility bills in BERRY tokens. If you'd like to learn more about out plans for the future, please take a look at the 'Roadmap' section of our whitepaper: https://rentberry.cryptonomos.com/downloads/Rentberry_Whitepaper_V1_en.pdf
